~~~
package lecture20181230;

public class Lecture02 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		//정수를 담는 변수, count선언
		int count;
		//실수를 담는 변수, average선언
		float average;
		//두 수를 출력하세요.
		count=1;
		average=1;
		System.out.println(count);
		System.out.println(average);
	}

}
~~~
